thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 13 of 523
thread.title: Carol

author: Carol
title: Carol
text: This dress was absolutely beautiful! We did have to have it taken in a bit on the shoulders because it was a little loose, but then had the one shoulder opened up and a clasp put in to make it easier to get in and out of. The neck was now smaller and I didn't want it to ruin her hair and makeup pulling it over. Worked out great!!! I will definitely be ordering again from Promgirl in the future!! The overnight availability was a lifesaver!!!
